body:
I literally have never heard of this until a few days ago when it came out. After doing some research, it actually looks really cool. Whenever I would play games, I would always think of ways it could be improved and what I would include in a game if I made it. Destiny is basically this game for me.

So I was wondering, because I am still pretty misinformed about it, could anyone give me some recommendations on whether to get it, if you enjoyed it, what you like and what you dislike about it? 

I don't want to hear anything about a rip-off of Halo or any other game. I've never played Halo so I don't care. The only one I've played CoD and I can safely say it does not compare. 

And I swear to god if anyone tells me to get a ps4, xbox 360, or xbone, I will track you down and kill your favourite pet.
